column4: trying to switch fron win to ubuntu - when booting off the cd (dvd) all i see is a blinking horizontal cursor.  But I hear the infamous startup sound that plays after initial load.
but no visual other than blinkign cursor.
I tried to install linux mint as an alternative to ubuntu, but it froze on firewire fw0 detection/initialization
from the second I boot from the CD, i see nothing.
so, I assume it's good enough to run ubuntu. then I specs wouldn't help much.
did you try to restart the 'xorg' from a a tty terminal ?
ok, when you bootup and hear the startup sound, press ALT+F1. and let me know if you can see a terminal. I will help you further.
did you try the same 'CD' in some other machine ? I am not sure but it could be that you graphic card is bit exotic.
yes, and worked.  actually burnt 6 coppies lmao
haha. ok then google " [Put your graphic card name here] problem with ubuntu linux". maybe that should help if you have tried yet.
I will try that, i appreciate the fact that you tried to help man.
